Purpose: High-quality, expressive TTS engine. Ideal for character voiceovers like Cave Johnson.
Setup Steps:
1. Clone the repo:
   git clone https://github.com/neonbjb/tortoise-tts.git
2. Change directory:
   cd tortoise-tts
3. (Optional but recommended) Create a virtual environment:
   python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows: venv\Scripts\activate
4. Install dependencies:
   pip install -r requirements.txt
5. Download the pretrained models and voices (follow GitHub instructions)
6. Run voice clone test (after preparing dataset):
   python tortoise/do_tts.py --text "Your script here" --voice cave

Purpose: Fast, real-time capable TTS with fewer system requirements. Good for quick responses.
Setup Steps:
1. Clone the repo:
   git clone https://github.com/coqui-ai/TTS.git
2. Change directory:
   cd TTS
3. (Optional but recommended) Create a virtual environment:
   python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows: venv\Scripts\activate
4. Install dependencies:
   pip install -r requirements.txt
5. Download XTTS2 pretrained model and follow XTTS2 setup (from Coqui docs)
6. Run TTS with XTTS2:
   python TTS/bin/synthesize.py --text "Hello world" --speaker_wav cave_sample.wav --model_path path_to_xtts2_model
